services.name: Solar Panel Cleaning
services.short_description: Solar panel cleaning using pure, filtered water and a purpose-built solar brush to improve panel cleanliness without harsh chemicals.
includes: Cleaning with a purpose-built solar panel brush
Pure water cleaning using mobile RO/DI filtration (reverse osmosis + deionization) using the customer’s water source
Safety-first approach with attention to roof conditions, access, and nearby hazards
excludes: Any chemical cleaning agents on solar panels
Guaranteed production or savings claims without system data
why_it_matters: Real-world dust, grime, pollen, and environmental buildup can reduce the light reaching PV cells and lower energy production.
In many systems, cells/modules are wired in series so a shaded/dirty section can limit current and reduce output; bypass diodes help but losses can still be significant.

required_for_quote.label: Is there a working outdoor water spigot within ~100 feet of the panels (or near the work area)?
When were the panels last cleaned?

common_add_ons: Bird proofing / panel skirting (metal/PVC) to reduce nesting under panels

common_questions.q: Do I really need to clean my solar panels?
common_questions.a: In most real-world environments, yes. Dust and grime can build up over months and reduce the light getting into the cells. Since many PV components are wired in series, a dirty/shaded section can drag down output for part of the system. Cleaning helps restore the panel surface so the system can perform closer to its potential.

common_questions.q: Do you use soap or chemicals on the panels?
common_questions.a: No. We clean panels using pure, filtered water and a purpose-built solar brush. Many panels have coatings and manufacturer guidance that can be affected by chemicals, so we avoid them.

common_questions.q: How do you price solar panel cleaning?
common_questions.a: Pricing depends on several factors such as the number of panels, mounting type (roof vs ground), access and safety considerations, and job conditions. If you tell me your panel count and where they’re mounted, I can give you a quote and help you book.

handoff_triggers: Customer asks for guaranteed energy production improvements or specific % gains
Unusual access/safety constraints (e.g., extreme height, major roof hazards, no safe access)
Customer requests chemical cleaning on solar panels

services.name: Roof Cleaning
services.short_description: Professional roof cleaning to remove organic growth and staining while prioritizing roof-surface and human safety.
includes: Initial visual assessment of roof condition and access
Targeted cleaning using methods appropriate for the roof type (soft wash when applicable)
Rinse-down of surrounding areas affected by runoff as needed
Before/after photos when requested (availability may vary by job)
excludes: Roof repairs, leak diagnosis, or replacement of broken tiles/shingles pre-existing to our service (we fix what we broke)
Gutter cleaning (unless quoted as an add-on)
Painting or sealing/coating unless explicitly quoted

required_for_quote.label: Anything that affects access (steep pitch, fragile tile, tight driveway, height, lift needed)

common_questions.q: Will roof cleaning damage my roof?
common_questions.a: The goal is to match the method to the roof type and condition. Some roofs (especially older or fragile tile) require extra care and a gentler process. If anything looks high-risk or unusual, we’ll recommend a human assessment before final pricing.

common_questions.q: Do you use high pressure on roofs?
common_questions.a: Roof cleaning is typically not a “blast it with mega pressure” job. We test and adjust pressure so it’s enough to do the job but not excessive. Some roof surfaces are better served by soft wash methods, and the right approach depends on roof type and condition.
Most residential roof cleanings are completed in 1–2 days, but complexity, roof type, and access can extend the timeline. If it sounds complex, we can have a human confirm the details.

common_questions.q: Do I need to be home?
common_questions.a: Not always, as long as we have access and the job details are confirmed. Please share any gate/lock instructions or outdoor pet notes and a human can finalize logistics if needed.
We aim to protect surrounding areas and rinse as appropriate, but please let us know about sensitive plants or sentimental items so we can plan accordingly.

upsells_and_addons: House wash / soft wash of siding
handoff_triggers: Roof type is unknown and customer cannot estimate
Customer reports leaks, broken tiles, or active roof damage
Access requires special equipment (e.g., boom lift) or tight access constraints
Customer asks for guarantees or wants a binding schedule confirmation

Cleaning of the agreed exterior surfaces
Basic rinse-down of surrounding overspray areas as needed
excludes: Paint stripping or restoration unless explicitly quoted

Water reclamation/compliance requirements unless explicitly quoted
Sealing/coating after washing unless explicitly quoted

required_for_quote.label: What needs cleaning (driveway, patio, walkway, pavers, etc.)
Approximate square footage of the area
Any heavy staining (oil, rust, algae, tire marks) or special concerns?
Do you need water reclamation / runoff compliance support?

common_questions.q: How often should I do it?

services.name: Soft Washing
services.short_description: Low-pressure cleaning for surfaces that need a gentler approach, like siding, stucco, and delicate exterior finishes.
includes: Assessment of exterior material and condition
Application of a low-pressure cleaning solution where appropriate
Gentle rinse to remove organic buildup and staining
excludes: Guaranteed removal of all oxidation or deep staining without evaluation

required_for_quote.label: What surface are we cleaning (stucco, siding, painted surfaces, fence, etc.)?
Any sensitive landscaping, pets, paint issues, or special concerns?

common_questions.q: What’s the difference between soft washing and pressure washing?
common_questions.a: Pressure washing relies more on force; soft washing relies more on chemistry and gentle rinsing. Soft washing is often used on surfaces that could be damaged or marked by high pressure.

common_questions.q: Is it safe for plants and pets?
common_questions.a: We try to protect surrounding areas and rinse appropriately, but please mention sensitive plants and pets. If you’re concerned, we can have a human confirm the plan.
Soft washing is very effective on organic growth and surface grime, but results can vary with oxidation, paint condition, and deeply set staining. We avoid promising perfection without seeing it.

common_questions.q: How long will it stay clean?
common_questions.a: It depends on shade, moisture, and local conditions. Many customers see longer-lasting results in sunnier, drier areas and shorter intervals in shaded or damp areas.

upsells_and_addons: Roof cleaning (if staining/growth is also present)
Solar panel cleaning (for homeowners with solar)
handoff_triggers: Customer asks about specific chemicals and wants exact product names/percentages
Customer has severe paint failure, oxidation, or prior damage concerns
